column2: Qumózek) is a town and the administrative center of Kamyzyaksky District in Astrakhan Oblast
column4: located on the Kamyzyak River (a branch in the delta of the Volga)
column6: the administrative center of the oblast. Population: 16

column1: Kamyzyak was founded around 1560 as a fishing village along the Volga. It was granted town status on February 2
Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Kamyzyak serves as the administrative center of Kamyzyaksky District. As an administrative division
column3: it is incorporated within Kamyzyaksky District as the town of district significance of Kamyzyak. As a municipal division
column4: the town of district significance of Kamyzyak is incorporated within Kamyzyaksky Municipal District as Kamyzyak Urban Settlement.
